has_js.description: Registers whether or not the user has activated JavaScript in the browser.

allowCookies.description: Registers what cookies user has approved.

__cfduid.description: Used by the content network, Cloudflare, to identify trusted web traffic

_ga.description: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

_gat.description: Used by Google Analytics to throttle request rate.

_gid.description: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

collect.description: Used to send data to Google Analytics about the visitor's device and behaviour. Tracks the visitor across d evices and marketing channels.

uvc.description: Updates the counter for the web site's social sharing features.
